TECHFORB.COMPANY_INFO: North American technology company with professionals located in Brazil, Chile, and Argentina.
TECHFORB.ROLE: Full Stack Developer using Angular, Node.js, and NestJS technologies.
TECHFORB.DESCRIPTION: Creation of robust systems and websites with modular architecture. In the frontend, using RxJS for manipulating asynchronous data flows, as well as interceptors for managing HTTP requests, dynamic theme manipulation (SCSS variables) for visual customization, and internationalization of languages (i18n). In the backend, development of complex APIs with lifecycle management using Express and NestJS. Authentication process via JWT and data validation through middlewares and validators. Integration between frontend and backend applications.

PROGRAMADOR_TV.COMPANY_INFO: Programador.TV is a company specialized in developing social and educational products for programmers.
PROGRAMADOR_TV.ROLE: Full Stack Developer using React, Next.js, Node.js and C# technologies in a cloud environment.
PROGRAMADOR_TV.DESCRIPTION_FIRST: Backend development focused on software quality aspects, architecture, and best software engineering practices. Main focus on refactoring non-standardized code, aiming to follow code organization based on clean architecture, identifying complex logic and abstraction in application layers. Replacement of old code with new code. Conducting unit tests for the refactored functionalities.
PROGRAMADOR_TV.DESCRIPTION_SECOND: In the frontend, development of a new project that implements features aimed at making programmers' lives easier with the integration of Artificial Intelligence using React and Next.js.

LPM.COMPANY_INFO: Holding company that develops and operates eLearning content providers.
LPM.ROLE: Full Stack Developer using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js technologies.
LPM.DESCRIPTION_FIRST: Creation, maintenance, and updating of improvements for the LPM Cursos eLearning platform.
LPM.DESCRIPTION_SECOND: Development of the digital certificate generation functionality after the student completes the chosen course.

MATH_CALCULATOR_AI.DESCRIPTION: Project integrated with Google AI Studio, which returns the result of a mathematical expression requested by the user. It contains an image on DockerHub and is deployed on Amazon ECS (Elastic Container Service), which manages Docker containers and performs deployment.
